name: TaproomVoiceDemo
0:
”Alexa, open Taproom Voice Demo”
”Alexa, ask Taproom Voice Demo for beer menu”
”Alexa, ask Taproom Voice Demo for today's food truck”
skdetail:
Rated: Mature. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: taproom voice demo
Developer Terms of Use
des:
This skill demonstrates how taprooms and local breweries can inform their patrons about what's brewing, cooking, and happening at their favorite local taproom through a voice app. The core features include Beer menu, Food truck, and Events. Asking for Beer menu will list the available beers served at the taproom. It also enables users to check the latest additions to the menu and filter beers by style. The Food truck option provides updates on the food trucks scheduled to pull up at the bar through the week. And the Events feature gives details of the exciting occasions and activities slated to be held in the upcoming days at the taproom. 
Once you’ve enabled the app on your Alexa device, just say Alexa, open Taproom Voice Demo. Then you can use any of the following commands:

To get a list of available beers, say:
Beer menu
What beers are available?

To know about the food truck schedule, say:
Food truck
Which food truck is scheduled for Tuesday?
Which food truck is at the bar tonight?

To look for upcoming events, say:
Events
What events are happening at the bar tonight?

To check your preferred style of beer:
What Sours are on the menu?
Do you have Lagers on the menu?

To check the latest beer releases:
What’s new on the menu?
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
